name: Robodash
description: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey with Robodash, a brutally challenging casual indie game! This 3rd person 3D platformer will test your skills to the extreme, as each fall means starting over. Navigate through unforgiving obstacles, dodge treacherous traps, and conquer daunting gaps with precision. Robodash's addictive gameplay, combined with its simple graphics, will keep you hooked for endless attempts. Get ready for a rage-inducing platforming experience that will push you to your limits! I'm sorry.
